ANIMATED.name: Animated
ANIMATED.description: Your team members takes one third less damage from sources that aren't attacks.

ARTILLERY.name: Artillery
ARTILLERY.description: Your team members deal 20% more move damage after their first turn.

ASSASSIN.name: Assassin
ASSASSIN.description: Your team deals 20% more move damage on their first turn out.

BUSHWHACKER.name: Bushwhacker
BUSHWHACKER.description: Your team's 'Not Very Effective' or 'Barely Effective' moves deal 50% more damage.

CARETAKER.name: Caretaker
CARETAKER.description: Your team members heal for 1/10th HP when swapping out. Your Aid Kit heals for 25% more.

CHARMER.name: Charmer
CHARMER.description: Your team takes 20% less move damage on the turns they enter.

DECEIVER.name: Deceiver
DECEIVER.description: Enemy trainers majorly overestimate how much damage their moves do.

FORTUNE.name: Fortune
FORTUNE.description: Your moves have a +30% chance to activate their moves' additional effects.

HARMONIC.name: Harmonic
HARMONIC.description: Your team take 10% less move damage.

INDUSTRIOUS.name: Industrious
INDUSTRIOUS.description: You gain 10% more money from battles. If you have more than $100

LOYAL.name: Loyal
LOYAL.description: Your team members gain 10% more EXP in battles. They also get a small boost to Attack

MYSTIC.name: Mystic
MYSTIC.description: Whenever a member of your team uses a status move

NOBLE.name: Noble
NOBLE.description: Your team members take 15% less move damage if they're using a status move this turn.

RADIANT.name: Radiant
RADIANT.description: Your team has 30% increased Sp. Def. Foes can't lower your team's Sp. Def.

SCAVENGER.name: Scavenger
SCAVENGER.description: Your team members berries heal them for 25% more (multiplicative) and their gem-boosted attacks deal 25% more damage (multiplicative).

SCOURGE.name: Scourge
SCOURGE.description: Your able party members and battlers heal for 1/10th HP whenever a foe faints.

SCRAPPER.name: Scrapper
SCRAPPER.description: Your team has 30% increased Defense. Foes can't lower your team's Defense.

SERENE.name: Serene
SERENE.description: Enemy Pokemon's chance to activate their additional effects against your team members is halved.

TACTICIAN.name: Tactician
TACTICIAN.description: Your Pokemon deal 15% more damage to targets that havenâ€™t moved yet this turn. Your priority attacks and priority status moves have doubled PP.

TYRANNICAL.name: Tyrannical
TYRANNICAL.description: Ignore the first time each battle that one of your team members would flinch or get a status condition.

WARRIOR.name: Warrior
WARRIOR.description: Your team members take 15% less move damage if they're using an attack this turn.
